analyzed: sardza ra dza dag dang ni //

analyzed: be ta dkar mo'i char rgyun gyis //

analyzed: rtsa ba'i rig pa gang de la //

analyzed: stong tsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni //

original: de nas mkhas pas ri lu bya //
analyzed: de nas mkhas pas ri lu bya //

original: gang zhig mchod pa'i dus su ni //
analyzed: gang zhig mchod pa'i dus su ni //
translated: At the time of worship,

original: sems kyi dbang phyug ting 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: sems kyi dbang phyug ting 'dzin gyis //
translated: the lord of mind, through meditative stabilization,

original: rnam par sbyangs pa'i sa gzhi la /
analyzed: rnam par sbyangs pa'i sa gzhi la /
translated: on a purified ground,

original: rten sogs dgram par byas nas ni //
analyzed: rten sogs dgram par byas nas ni //
translated: having arranged the supports and so forth,

original: tshogs gter bdag mdun bkug nas //
analyzed: tshogs gter bdag mdun bkug nas //
translated: having summoned the treasure lords in front,

original: rdo rje can gyis bdug pa dbul //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyis bdug pa dbul //
translated: the vajri·πáƒ´ offers incense.

original: gser sogs mdzes pa'i snod du ni //
analyzed: gser sogs mdzes pa'i snod du ni //
translated: In a beautiful vessel of gold and so forth,

original: tsandan la @72b sogs mdag me la //
analyzed: tsandan la @72b sogs mdag me la //
translated: in a fire of sandalwood and so forth,üîΩthe pill explained previously is burned;

original: sngar bshad pa yi ri lu bsreg / des ni rten la bdug par bya //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa yi ri lu bsreg / des ni rten la bdug par bya //

original: sbyor nges skyob pa mnyes gyur na //
analyzed: sbyor nges skyob pa mnyes gyur na //
translated: If the protector is pleased by the definite union,

original: gter rnams de yi mod la ster //
analyzed: gter rnams de yi mod la ster //
translated: the treasures are given at that very moment.

original: gal te de ltar ma gyur na //
analyzed: gal te de ltar ma gyur na //
translated: If it does not happen in that way,

original: gter bdag nyams par gdon mi za //
analyzed: gter bdag nyams par gdon mi za //
translated: there is no doubt that the treasure lord will be ruined.

original: 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste //
analyzed: 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste //
translated: This is very secret;

original: gsang ba'i gnas su spyad par bya //
analyzed: gsang ba'i gnas su spyad par bya //
translated: it should be practiced in a secret place.

original: bdug spos kyi sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: bdug spos kyi sbyor ba'o //
translated: This is the method of incense.

original: de nas dam tshig bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas dam tshig bshad bya ba //
translated: Next, the commitments should be explained:

original: rtag par khrus dang gtsang sbra bya //
analyzed: rtag par khrus dang gtsang sbra bya //
translated: Always bathe and be clean.

original: rnga dril la sogs rol mo'i sgra //
analyzed: rnga dril la sogs rol mo'i sgra //
translated: The sounds of musical instruments such as drums and bells,üîΩVarious fragrant flowers,

original: sna tshogs me tog dri ldan dang // sna tshogs 'bru yi chan dang bshos //
analyzed: sna tshogs me tog dri ldan dang // sna tshogs 'bru yi chan dang bshos //
translated: Various types of grain, and food,

original: mdzes pa'i dang snas rtag mchod bya //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i dang snas rtag mchod bya //
translated: Should always be offered with beautiful vessels.

original: chang rnams dbul bar mi bya ste //
analyzed: chang rnams dbul bar mi bya ste //
translated: Alcoholic beverages should not be offered,

original: sha ni brtags te dbul bar bya ;
analyzed: sha ni brtags te dbul bar bya ;
translated: But meat may be offered after examination.

original: / rtag tu sngon po'i gos 'chang zhing //
analyzed: / rtag tu sngon po'i gos 'chang zhing //
translated: Always wearing blue garments,

original: lung thang 'bras bu'i bgrang 'phreng bgrang //
analyzed: lung thang 'bras bu'i bgrang 'phreng bgrang //
translated: Counting a rosary of wheat,

original: myur 'gro sha yi bza' ba spang //üîΩnyams shing chag pa'i snod mi bza' //
analyzed: myur 'gro sha yi bza' ba spang // nyams shing chag pa'i snod mi bza' //
translated: One should abandon quickly moving meat to eat.üîΩOne should not eat from a damaged or broken vessel,üîΩNor sit on a rough or black seat.

original: rtsub cing nag po'i stan mi 'dug / bza' bral mas bstabs bza' btung rnams //üîΩrnam pa kun du mi spyod do //
analyzed: rtsub cing nag po'i stan mi 'dug / bza' bral mas bstabs bza' btung rnams // rnam pa kun du mi spyod do //
translated: One should not partake in any way of food and drinküîΩOffered by a woman separated from her husband.

original: srog bral ba la reg pa spang //
analyzed: srog bral ba la reg pa spang //
translated: One should abandon contact with those devoid of life force.

original: bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig go //
translated: This is the samaya to be guarded.

original: de nas rten ni bshad par bya //üîΩphyi nang gsang ba'i bye brag gi //
analyzed: de nas rten ni bshad par bya // phyi nang gsang ba'i bye brag gi //
translated: Next, the supports will be explained.üîΩThe supports for the treasure lords,

original: gter bdag brten pa'i rten yang ni //
analyzed: gter bdag brten pa'i rten yang ni //
translated: With distinctions of outer, inner, and secret,üîΩAre as follows:

original: rnam pa gsum du mkhas pas brtag / phyi rten rta mchog rab sngo la //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum du mkhas pas brtag / phyi rten rta mchog rab sngo la //
translated: The outer support is a supreme horse, very blue,

original: mdzes pa'i rgyan btags mgon la dmigs //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i rgyan btags mgon la dmigs //
translated: with beautiful ornaments, visualized as the protector.

original: rtag tu yang ni bcang bar bya //
analyzed: rtag tu yang ni bcang bar bya //
translated: It should always be worn.

original: yang na gzugs legs rab tu gzung //
analyzed: yang na gzugs legs rab tu gzung //
translated: Or else, a fine form should be well held.

original: gsang rten gro ga'i shun sogs la //
analyzed: gsang rten gro ga'i shun sogs la //
translated: The secret support is on birch bark, etc.,

original: gur gum dri bzangs rab spel bas //
analyzed: gur gum dri bzangs rab spel bas //
translated: with the excellent scent of saffron,

original: bee yig bris la sngags kyis bskor //
analyzed: bee yig bris la sngags kyis bskor //
translated: with the syllable VAI written, surrounded by the mantra.

original: rin chen dang bcas rin chen gzugs //
analyzed: rin chen dang bcas rin chen gzugs //
translated: With jewels, and a jewel form,

original: 'bru mchog btags nas bsnos byas la //
analyzed: 'bru mchog btags nas bsnos byas la //
translated: having tied the best grain, it should be hung.

original: mkhas pas byas te snying po gzhug / tshon byugs nas ni mdun gzhag go //
analyzed: mkhas pas byas te snying po gzhug / tshon byugs nas ni mdun gzhag go //
translated: The wise one should make it, and insert the essence. Having anointed it with color, it should be placed in front.

original: gnyis pa bram ze'i ras dag gam //
analyzed: gnyis pa bram ze'i ras dag gam //
translated: The second is on the cloth of a brahmin,

original: gzhon nu ma yis legs bkal ba'i //
analyzed: gzhon nu ma yis legs bkal ba'i //
translated: or well-woven by a young woman,

original: ras la dri yis rab bsgos nas //
analyzed: ras la dri yis rab bsgos nas //
translated: the cloth well-perfumed with scent.

original: gter bdag sku mdog phyag char ldan //
analyzed: gter bdag sku mdog phyag char ldan //
translated: The form of the lord of treasures, with color and implements,

original: lugs nas 'byung ba'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: lugs nas 'byung ba'i rim pa yis //
translated: in the sequence as it occurs in the treatise,

original: dam tshig ldan pas myur bris la//
analyzed: dam tshig ldan pas myur bris la//
translated: the one with samaya should quickly draw it.

original: phyi rol shing sogs rgyan gyis mdzes //
analyzed: phyi rol shing sogs rgyan gyis mdzes //
translated: Outside, it is beautified with ornaments of trees, etc.

original: sngags rig pas ni mdun dgram bya //
analyzed: sngags rig pas ni mdun dgram bya //
translated: The one with knowledge of mantra should arrange it in front.

original: rten gzugs pa yi rim pa'o //
analyzed: rten gzugs pa yi rim pa'o //
translated: The sequence of the physical support.

original: de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste //
analyzed: de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste //
translated: Then, the secret should be explained.

original: sgrub po gsang bdag phyags bltas te //
analyzed: sgrub po gsang bdag phyags bltas te //
translated: The adept, the Lord of Secrets, should be seen

original: gtor ma'ang de nyid phyogs su spyi na //
analyzed: gtor ma'ang de nyid phyogs su spyi na //
translated: and the bali offering should be placed in that very direction.üîΩThe secret support should be placed in a mouse hole,

original: gsang rten ne'u le'i rlud bur gzhug / sngon dmar kha spro @73a * //
analyzed: gsang rten ne'u le'i rlud bur gzhug / sngon dmar kha spro @73a * //
translated: red in color, with an open mouth,

original: rgyun 'chang zhing //
analyzed: rgyun 'chang zhing //
translated: and always held.

original: 'bras sogs 'bru rnams der gzhug bya //
analyzed: 'bras sogs 'bru rnams der gzhug bya //
translated: Grains such as rice should be placed there.

original: gzhan gyis mthon na dngos grub nyams //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mthon na dngos grub nyams //
translated: If seen by others, spiritual powers will decline.

original: gtor sgrub pa la gsang ba shis //
analyzed: gtor sgrub pa la gsang ba shis //
translated: It is auspicious to keep the secret in bali practice.

original: cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
analyzed: cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
translated: By this method of the ritual,

original: nam mkha' mdzod la rnam par rol //
analyzed: nam mkha' mdzod la rnam par rol //
translated: one will enjoy the sky treasury.

original: rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi rtogs pa bde byed cho ga sna tshogs pa'i mdzod ces bya ba rdzogs so//
analyzed: rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi rtogs pa bde byed cho ga sna tshogs pa'i mdzod ces bya ba rdzogs so//
translated: The treasury of various rituals for accomplishing the blissful realization of Vai≈õrava·πáa, the great king, is complete.
